name: Eyes
baseMeaning: A pair of eyes, looking slightly to the left.
tldr: Means 'I see that' or 'eyes on this'. Used for gossip, interest, or calling attention.

contextMeanings.meaning: Drawing attention to something interesting or noteworthy.
Noticing something suspicious or worth discussing.
Showing interest in someone or their actions.

platformNotes.note: Used to amplify gossip or breaking news - 'look at this'.
Common in comments calling attention to details in videos.
Popular reaction for interesting or suspicious content.

generationalNotes.note: Heavily used for gossip and drawing attention to tea.
Same usage - indicates something worth paying attention to.
May interpret more literally or be confused by context.

warnings.title: Gossip implications
warnings.description: Often implies there's something noteworthy or suspicious happening. Can feel like calling someone out.
